item.title: EKC 16.3 CHRISTMAS EDITION HAS BEEN PUSHED TO YOU ALL. TO GET MOVIES AND SHOWS RIGHT NOW IVE MADE THE APK SYSTEM VERY SIMPLE FOR YOU. CLICK ON APK AND INSTALL ALL THE LISTED APKS. FOLLOW THE PROMPTS AFTER YOU CLICK. AFTER EACH IS INSTALLED IT CAN BE LAUNCHED FROM WITHIN EKC FOR SIMPLICITY. CLICK ON YOU DESIRED APK IN THE APK SUB MENU BY CLICKING DOWN WHEN APK IS HIGHLIGHTED.-

THE NEW EKC FIRE TV IS IN STOCK AND AVAILABLE NOW FOR $159.95. HEAD OVER TO ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM AND GET ONE TODAY! DONATIONS ARE ALWAYS VERY APPRECIATED-IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO DONATE YOU CAN AT PAYPAL.ME/ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG - YOU CAN PURCHASE PRELOADED DEVICES AT ELITEKUSTOMCONFIG.COM
